page.title: 20Worlingworth School Children
page.content: We the children of Worlingworth primary school,junior class,during the past few weeks,have been enjoying;swimming sport s days,family & school outings,entering the village art & writing competitions, doing interviews & surveys for the doomsday project in addition to routine work.During this time,the media has told us of;a torrential downpour which swamped the Wimbledon tennis tournement a tragic air disaster off the Irish coast,the hijacking of an American passenger plane & a pop concert given by top artists for victims of the African famine.This lasted 16 hours with a satellite link-up between Wem- beley & Philadelphia. ___ WE SALUTE YOU ___ Kim,Hayley,Elaine,Rachel,Lucy,Lynette, Marie,Clare,Fiona,Lisa,Tabitha,Shelley, Charlotte,Wendy,Martin,Tim,Jon,Chris, Nigel,Alastair,Gary,Scott.
